TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击模板中的 "插入" 按钮时 ，控件会在 控件更新数据源中的记录后引发事件。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked, and after the control updates the record at the data source. (插入按钮是其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "插入" 的按钮。在 事件 ) ，你可以执行自定义操作，例如从数据库中检索已插入项的自动生成的值。(An Insert button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Insert".) The event enables you to perform a custom action, such as retrieving auto-generated values from the database for the inserted item. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，这使您能够确定插入的项数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of items inserted and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受插入操作影响的项的数目，请使用 属性。To determine the number of items affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用 属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether an exception occurred. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常 。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果必须访问已发送到数据源的插入项的字段值，请使用 属性。If you have to access the field values of the inserted item that were sent to the data source, use the property. 默认情况下，该 控件在 插入操作之后清除模板，这样用户便可以为要插入的新项添加值。By default, the control clears the template after an insert operation, which enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted. 如果在插入操作过程中发生异常，则可以 通过将属性设置为来使控件保持在插入模式下 `true` 。If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 这会将 模板重新绑定到前一次尝试插入项的值。This rebinds the template to the values from the previous attempt to insert an item. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递到事件处理程序的对象 。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to the handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#1)]

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

param.name: exception
param.span: 执行插入操作时引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: The exception that is raised when the insert operation was performed, if any.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||参数中包含的对象 `e` 。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为 `false` 。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为 `false` 。Initialized to `false`.|

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定受插入操作影响的记录数（由数据源控件返回）。Use the property to determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, as returned by the data source control. 此属性通常用于以下情况：This property is typically used in the following scenarios: - 验证是否只插入了一条记录。To verify that only a single record was inserted. 有时错误写入的 insert 语句可能会插入多个记录。Sometimes an incorrectly written insert statement can insert multiple records. - 如果在插入操作过程中出现错误，但未引发异常，则验证是否未插入记录。To verify that a record was not inserted because an error occurred during the insert operation, but an exception was not raised. - 若要验证在支持冲突检测) (的数据源控件是否已插入记录，请 将其属性设置为 `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` 枚举值。To verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 支持此属性的控件包括 和 控件。Controls that supports this property include the and controls. 当属性具有此值时，如果记录的键值与其他用户插入的记录的键值相同，则可能不会插入记录。When the property has this value, a record might not be inserted if it has the same key value as a record inserted by another user. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理程序的对象 来确定是否在插入操作过程中引发了异常。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to a handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 在插入操作过程中引发的异常，如果未引发异常，则为 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the insert operation, or if no exception was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发了异常，并且在事件处理程序中处理了异常，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则， 控件将重新引发异常。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理程序的对象 来确定是否在插入操作过程中引发了异常。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to a handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在插入操作过程中引发异常时，请使用 属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则异常被视为已处理并且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则 控件将重新引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理程序的对象 来确定插入操作期间是否引发了异常。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to the handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为 模板内的控件保留用户输入值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the template.

value.span: 如果为 模板内的控件保留用户输入值，则为 ；如果用该控件的默认值替代用户输入值，则为 。

span.span: if the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the template; if the user's input values are replaced with the default values for the controls.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在 插入操作后，控件会将控件的值从模板重置 为其默认值。By default, the control resets the control's values from the template to their default values after an insert operation. 这样，用户便可以为要插入的新项添加值。This enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted. 如果在插入操作过程中引发了异常，则可以 通过将属性设置为来使控件保持在插入模式下 `true` 。If an exception is raised during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 这会保留前一次尝试为模板内的控件插入项的值 。This maintains the values from the previous attempt to insert an item for the controls inside the template. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来保留用户在插入操作过程中发生错误时输入的值。The following example shows how to use the property to preserve the values entered by the user when an error occurs during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取插入记录的字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: 插入记录的字段名称/值对。

span.span: The field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问已插入记录的字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，您可以使用这些值来保存插入记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 属性返回 实现接口的对象 。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 表示插入记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. 若要访问字段名称，请使用 对象的属性 。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，可以使用属性访问字段值 。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如 ) 只能通过索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index.

related.span: 技术概述： ListView 控件

span.span: Technology Overview: The ListView Control
